name: The unitary Jordan totient function applied to the cubefree numbers (A004709).
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: f[p_, e_] := p^(2*e)-1; uj2[1] = 1; uj2[n_] := Times @@ f @@@ FactorInteger[n]; cubeFreeQ[n_] := AllTrue[FactorInteger[n][[;; , 2]], # < 3 &]; uj2 /@ Select[Range[100], cubeFreeQ]
program: list(lim) = apply(uj2, select(iscubefree, vector(lim, i, i)));
author: _Amiram Eldar_, Apr 02 2025

name: The unitary totient function applied to the cubefree numbers (A004709).
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: f[p_, e_] := p^e-1; uphi[1] = 1; uphi[n_] := Times @@ f @@@ FactorInteger[n]; cubeFreeQ[n_] := AllTrue[FactorInteger[n][[;; , 2]], # < 3 &]; uphi /@ Select[Range[100], cubeFreeQ]
program: list(lim) = apply(uphi, select(iscubefree, vector(lim, i, i)));
author: _Amiram Eldar_, Apr 02 2025
